ValidationRule.description: This validation rule ensures that when the Account record type is "Committee_Reviewer," and the Committee picklist is set to "EDRD Sub Committee" then Committee Name field is not left blank.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Committee__pc, "EDRD Sub Committee"), ISPICKVAL(Committee_Name__pc, ""), Record_Type_Name__c = 'Committee_Reviewer' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: When Committee is EDRD Sub Committee then Committee Name cannot be blank.
